divs: Sighting Detailsmy girl friend and i were out back at 6 p.m. i was showing her the area in the sky that i had seen a large amber light expand like a nova then go back down to a starlike object and then fly to the south; when a few seconds later i see a large amber landing light looking object my girl friend looks up to see it i tell her to track it will i get the binoculars, she makes a comment about how easy it is to see. it continues across the sky from the the s.east ,i'm now watching it with the binocuars its a triangle with a white light on the front a red lighton rear port side and a green light on the rear starboard side 2 white lights in the center. completely silent. we watched as it passed over, it then flipped on its side which made the lights of the craft line up single file as it drove towards the n.east horizon our house blocked our view as i ran around the side of the house but lost site of it . hard to tell but craft seemed to be around 20,000 ft.
